answer:
In Canada, vaccines are purchased from variety of vaccine manufacturers to help ensure a steady supply of quality vaccines for all Canadians. This process is coordinated by the Government of Canada to ensure vaccine purchases are coordinated, equitable and affordable. You can learn more here.
Immunization Nurse

You can learn more here.
